oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Englar Theatrical Agency Job No. 16287
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Typed invoice for an order placed by Bob Englar Theatrical Agency for 100 color Jumbos (half sheets) announcing the 1st Annual Mountain Springs Bluegrass Festival on September 6, 7, and 8. Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description. To view the poster for this order, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/31891. To view a poster featuring handwritten edits to the poster's copy, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/31892.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:accessRights: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
